A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Been a Star Wars fan since I was a little kid.  The whole movie was great.  The last 30 minutes were phenomenal.  I loved the story that unfolded with Luke that is a full circle with his character.  Great effects\, great story and great fun.  I'm sad to see the backlash from a small group of Star Wars fans that should know better.  \nThey think Luke was too dark\, I think the story plays out just as it should.. past failures repeating themselves and I thought it was beautiful.  I thoroughly enjoyed this movie.  One of my favorites in the series now.
